title: Mini-Ep 329: Breathe Right, Sleep Right
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 329: Breathe Right, Sleep Right
description:
Doree continues to search for cool sun protection and Kate starts ADHD meds. Then, listeners write in about writing, a favorite new cleanser, and 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or visit shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.

 

This episode is sponsored by:

CONAIR COOL AIR - For gorgeous long-lasting curls and waves, go to walgreens.com and search Conair Cool Air Styler or pick up an InfinitiPRO by Conair Cool Air Styler at your favorite retailer!


THUMA - Listeners can use the code FOREVER to receive a twenty-five dollar credit towards your purchase of The Bed plus free shipping at Thuma.co/forever. 


VEGAMOUR - Go to vegamour.com/forever35 and use code FOREVER35 to save 20 percent on your first order!


RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 


CARAWAY - Visit Carawayhome.com/Forever to take advantage of the limited-time offer for 10% off your next purchase.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
